name: external_api_inside_transaction
bug_description: External API call (PaymentGateway.charge) inside transaction holds database locks during network I/O. On timeout or retry, locks are held for extended periods causing deadlocks and connection pool exhaustion.
correct_implementation:
order.update!(status: :processing)
result = PaymentGateway.charge(order.total)
ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
  order.update!(status: :paid, payment_ref: result.id)
end

must_find.description: External API call (PaymentGateway.charge) inside transaction holds database locks during network I/O. On timeout or retry, locks are held for extended periods causing deadlocks and connection pool exhaustion.
